column3: utACK fab6c5f. I couldn't find any other uses of '~' except for in the [default wallet name](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/qt/bitcoingui.cpp#L78), but I don't think that gets translated , or even shown in the GUI?
> ...  I don't think that gets translated , or even shown in the GUI?\n\nRight, only strings wrapped in `tr()` or `_()` get translated.
